pages.text: Through the power of fire, the $(item)Hellish Bauble$() extinguishes any flames using some $(marked)ME.$(br2)Note that this does $(o)not$() enable you to swim in the nether. The Bauble does not protect against direct damage from $(item)Lava$().
Being made out of $(item)Netherite$(), the Bauble is completely fireproof.$(br2)$(o)You can equip this in the $(marked)Necklace$()$(o) trinket slot$().
